description:
Kasabi was a start-up created by Talis Information Ltd. It was a Linked Data marketplace that offered hosting and APIs over RDF data.

The service was shutdown in 2012. The datasets owned by this organisation are no longer updated. 

A complete archive of all datasets that were hosted and published by Kasabi can be [found at the Internet Archive](http://archive.org/details/kasabi)
name: kasabi
title: kasabi
